## firstSuccess() function

Returns the first successful result from a collection of [Result&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.result.md) or [DeferredResult&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.deferredresult.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function firstSuccess<T>(results: Iterable<Result<T> | DeferredResult<T>>): Result<T>;
```

</td><td>

The collection of [Result&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.result.md) or [DeferredResult&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.deferredresult.md) to be tested.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

The first successful result, or [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) with a concatenated summary of all error messages.
